column4: I have a 1.3g file. Whats the absolute fastest way to share it? Dropbox takes forever.
Dropbox is slow :/ Try uploading to somewhere, best idea would be some filehost with ftp (QShare is one of those, for instance)
and qshare is fast and easy?
I will be sharing with someone who isnt too bright computer speaking
Fast... quite fast. Easy? Just register, connect to ftp.qshare.com with your name and password trough the menu, and copy the file to "uploads"
And as for downloading, it's just a link, there one has to click "Free" and "Download the file"
thank you theadmin
the qshare website isnt loading
this isnt a good representation of their speed, sir
Where exactly are you going? it's qshare.com
yeah thats where Im going
been loading for 5 minutes now and I have a really fast connection
Hm, loads in a few seconds over here usually.
try it now, if you would
Maybe a maintenace, damn them
np
im uploading to my own ftp
not too fast though
Ah indeed, according to DFEOJM it's down
have any other alternative?
my ftp is slow as balls too. :<
There are a few i know, but they have too much ads on them and limit the speed
